Would still like to see nerfs/touch ups to {{champion:142}} and {{champion:84}}.

Why Nerf {{champion:83}}. How is he seen as a dominant pick i rarely see anyone play yorick. he better get buffed soon cause he needs those mist walkers to do even trades with the more dominant picks like {{champion:266}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:122}}

Volibear has had nothing major done for so long.  He is hardly picked in competitive play and I have never seen him picked at any major tournament for the last year... please do something to improve his gameplay and ability to carry late in the game.

oh I see there is a fiora buff. ok. I also see no akali or zoe nerfs. OK
hey riot excuse me but what the fuck

Quality of Life Request:
When setting your secondary runes, if you decide to change one, it automatically replaces the rune in the top slot, regardless to which slot you clicked on. For example, if you have Ghost Poro and Ultimate Hunter, but decide to swap Ultimate Hunter for Taste for Blood, no matter what it will replace Ghost Poro first, forcing you to redo both runes.

Solution: If you click a rune to re-open the rune-selection list, have the replacement fill the slot you clicked on. It's more intuitive and saves you the hassle of re-selecting both runes when you only wanted to change one, which in turn could let you squeak the change in before time runs out in champ select.

Original post by Mystery Ninja on NA
